name: WhiteNoiseRitual
0:
”Alexa open white noise ritual”
”Alexa ask white noise ritual to play baby sleep”
”Alexa ask white noise ritual to play chakra”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: white noise ritual
des:
Have trouble sleeping? Feeling burned out, emotionally drained, or mentally exhausted? We got you! This is the safest place to relax and meditate. The White Noise Ritual application enables you to uncover your innermost feelings of well-being through the noises around you using sound therapy.

Experienced the powerful combination of meditation, yoga, healing & health affirmations, and special white noise, along with Tibetan bowls and binaural beats, you will feel the best emotional journey in a beautiful setting. You'll enter a deep state of relaxation thanks to the vibrations of the music being played on the Tibetan bowls.

White Noise Ritual, an integrated health business established in 2022, creates straightforward tools to aid people in regaining their most profound states of wellbeing. We are introducing additional techniques to holistic health and cutting-edge technology to raise the human mind, informed by both ancient knowledge and current science.

Our objective
By getting more rest, renewal, and meditation, we hope to guide people toward their deepest states of well-being.

Skill Features:
Over 100 relaxing sounds to choose from
The user can quickly continue a prior session.
The user has the option of listening to audio indefinitely till stopping or pausing it.
Uninterrupted listening during track looping, track shuffle, or in between tracks.
Optional Audio Prompts
When a playlist has multiple songs, the next track is always played.
a single song from the playlist will be looped
Loops indefinitely without sound gaps
Tracks are automatically mixed each time a category is chosen.
Healing & Health affirmations
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
